PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
The chrome plugin was created to provide all the features of shop.cashlu.com in a more compact way.

To get a shopping tracked one had to go to shop.cashlu.com and get redirected to partner's website. Chrome plugin provided the solution to this. Users don't have to find the store and get redirected to it from shop.cashlu. Our users could simply login to shop.cashlu , install the plugin and just click the activate button to get him/her self redirected to the website he/she is currently visiting. For example : You visit flipkart.com-->The plugin is activated --> Click Activate. You get redirected automatically to tracked flipkart page and now your shopping gets tracked.
